title: LOGIN ISSUE
body: Since three days i have tried to login to play league but it does not i dont know whether i am banned or there is a bug riot please let me know i have tried riot support but it does not open please i want to plat the game

replies.body: I'd like to help, but need some more specifics on what's actually happening.  Were exactly are you having an issue, and are there any error messages?  What do they say?
There is no error message, when i login it just keeps showing 'authenticating...' and the screen just stays there

Thanks for the info!  It seems like something could be blocking your network from reaching the authenticating server, and likely timing out.  I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any blocks along the way.

You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings!

I hope that helps!
both the links are showing blank pages tried i several times
Your support page might be set to another language or region so it's not routing to the right link.  On the top right of the page, make sure it's set to English (US).

THANKS friend for your assistance i can play now, dont know what happened but i logged in and played a few.
THANK YOU
The launguage set is already North America (English)
